Description: Cloud-based website creation platform that allows users with no coding experience to design professional websites. Wix offers a variety of templates and drag-and-drop features, making it a popular choice for small businesses and entrepreneurs.

Ecommerce platform that allows businesses to set up their own online stores. Shopify offers a wide range of features, including product management, inventory management, payment processing, and marketing tools.

Email marketing automation platform that allows businesses to create and send email campaigns to their subscribers. MailChimp offers a variety of features, including email templates, automation workflows, and analytics.

Online payment processing and money transfer service that allows users to send and receive money online. PayPal is a popular choice for online shoppers and businesses that sell products or services online.

The Walt Disney Company, commonly known as Disney, is a leading diversified international entertainment and media enterprise that includes film production, animation, television broadcasting, theme parks, resorts, consumer products, interactive media, theater productions, and online media, direct-to-consumer, and international operations.

Customer messaging platform that allows businesses to communicate with their customers through live chat, messaging, and email. Intercom helps businesses to provide better customer support and improve customer satisfaction.

Search engine and technology company that offers a variety of products and services, including search, email, online maps, cloud storage, and productivity tools. Google is one of the most popular websites in the world and processes billions of searches every day.

Description: Note-taking and organization app that allows users to create notes, checklists, and to-do lists. Evernote also allows users to clip articles, web pages, and other content from the web.

Multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Its most well-known software products are the Windows operating system, the Microsoft Office suite, and the Internet Explorer web browser.

Prototyping platform that allows designers and product managers to create interactive prototypes of websites and apps. Invision helps designers to get feedback on their designs early in the development process.
